basics.name: Zachary Chaikin
basics.label: Graduate
basics.summary: May 2023 Graduate with a B.S. in Computer Science from the University of Hawaii at Manoa with Professional Experience in IT Support, and Web Development/Management.

education.institution: The University of Hawaii, Honolulu, HI
The University of Redlands, Redlands, CA

highlights: Clean up and modernize the website from plain HTML with WordPress.
Implement accessibility features for the blind and visually impaired with the WCAG.
Provide IT consultations on new and emerging software and technology.
Set up desktop computers and update software to the latest versions.

work.company: Hawaii Dinosaur Volleyball Tournament, Lihue, Kauai
work.position: Assistant Director, IT Support and Website Manager
highlights: Adapt to new software and technologies to enhance and modernize the tournament.
Assist in setting up the livestream for the event and creating content on YouTube.
Attain the ability to work and thrive in a high-pressure environment.
Build a user database while supporting and updating any user changes or issues.
Create custom calculations to automate processes with Google Sheets.
Design user forms integrating conditional logic and efficient workflows with JotForm.
Develop and manage the website to optimize user experience and showcase the event.
Efficiently communicate and coordinate with 120+ teams.
Provide IT consultations on new and emerging software and technology.
Acquire extensive experience in strategic event planning and time management.
Design tournament formats to elevate competitive standards and engage participants.
Inspire participation at all levels and cultivate a passion for volleyball.

work.company: Hawaii Preparatory Academy Summer High School Volleyball Training, Kamuela
highlights: Develop strong communication and qualities of leadership.
Mentor student-athletes to help them achieve individual and team growth.
